data.title: Martindale's Language Center: Sign Language & Braille
data.meta_description: MARTINDALE’S LANGUAGE & TRANSLATION CENTER SIGN LANGUAGE & BRAILLE U.S.: Saturday, December 28, 2019 Sydney, Australia: Sunday, December 29, 2019 File Download Time Calculator Author, E-Mail, Privacy Policy & Disclaimer Home Page ~ Language Center SIGN LANGUAGE & BRAILLE SIGN LANGUAGE Arabic ~ Bahasa (Brunei) Catalan (LSC) ~ Chinese (ZGS) ~ Croatian (HZJ) ~ Czech […]
data.text:
SIGN LANGUAGE

Arabic Sign Language – ? ???????

Arabic Sign Language Video Lessons with Text, Images https://ativanonlinetabs.com & Videos/Movies

ARABIC SIGN LANGUAGE – THE ALPHABET – YouTube

Multimedia Arabic Sign Language Alphabet (Text, Images, Videos/Movies & Audio/Sound).

Also includes IPA Sound for each Letter.

Other Arabic Sign Language Videos include

“…Arabic Sign Language – The Numbers;

Arabic Sign Language – Colors;

Arabic Sign Language – Food;

Arabic Sign Language – Jobs, Crafts, etc…”

Bahasa – Bahasa Isyarat Brunei

Bahasa Isyarat Dictionaries & Lessons with Text & Images

BAHASA ISYARAT – JAPEM Hak Cipta Terpelihara,

Brunei

Multimedia Bahasa Isyarat Dictionary (Text & Images).

For more information see

Bahasa Isyarat

Catalan Sign Language – Llengua de Signes Catalana (LSC)

Catalan Sign Language Dictionaries & Lessons with Text, Images & Videos/Movies

Información Con Texto Estructurado, S.L.

Multimedia Llengua de Signes Catalana (LSC) – Catalan Sign Language Dictionary & Lessons (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

For more information see

Sématos.eu

LLENGUA DE SIGNES CATALANA (LSC) – Wikisign LSC

Multimedia Llengua de Signes Catalana (LSC) – Catalan Sign Language Dictionary (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

Signes Catalana

“…Wikisign LSC, el diccionari lliure de Llengua de Signes Catalana que tothom pot completar i millorar…”

Multimedia Czech Sign Language (?eský znakový jazyk) and Czech Sign Language to other National Sign Languages (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

On the top right hand side of page CLICK ON “YOUR NATIONAL SIGN LANGUAGE”.

English (British), American English or English (India),

Czech, Estonian, Finnish, French, German (Germany or Austria),

Icelandic, Italian, Japanese, Latvian, Lithuanian, Polish,

Portuguese (Portugal or Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish or Ukrainian.

Enter “Word, Sentence or Number”.

Net Media Lab,

DEMOKRITOS, National Center for Scientific Research (NCSR),

Athens,

Greece

Multimedia Finnish Sign Language (Suomalainen viittomakieli), Greek Sign Language (???????? ????????? ??????) & British (English) Sign Language (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

For Finnish Sign Language (Suomalainen viittomakieli) Click on “Tervetuloa” – also includes

the Finnish Word in Greek & English.

For Greek Sign Language (???????? ????????? ??????) Click on “????? ??????”.

For British (English) Sign Language Click on “Welcome” – also includes

the English Word in Greek & Finnish.

For more information see

Net Media Lab or

DEMOKRITOS, National Center for Scientific Research (NCSR)

Multimedia Vlaamse Gebarentaal (VGT) – Flemish Sign Language Dictionary & Lessons (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

Flemish Sign Language Dictionary

“…contains over 6000 signs from Flemish Sign Language, but is still being

elaborated. The signs can be read through SignWriting and can be seen as moving pictures…”

For more information see

Universiteit Gent (Ghent University)

Belgium

“Dictionnaire de langue des signes belge – Belgian French Sign Language Dictionary” also includes

“…Alphabet;

Nombres;

Par thèmes;

Etude;

Révision

Règles simples;

Signer avec bébé; etc…”

LA LANGUE DES SIGNES DE BELGIQUE FRANCOPHONE – BELGIUM FRENCH SIGN LANGUAGE – S. Bruno,

H. Thierry, G. Claude, E.O. Rachid, H. Damien

& J. Jean-Luc, PROFILS, Belgium

Multimedia Langue des Signes de Belgique Francophone (LSFB) – Belgian French Sign Language Lessons (Text, Images & Videos/Movies).

“…La langue des signes de Belgique Francophone (abréviation: LSFB)

“…est la langue propre à la

communauté des sourds de la Communauté

française de Belgique…”
